https://tmrev.io/movie/428741-1971: Beyond Borders 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dwWlh5BCeu6u1nRTki3FAN2p1Ku.jpg Set against the backdrop of 1971 Indo-Pak war, the movie is inspired by real incidents and the protagonists are inspired by Param Vir Chakra recipients. The movie shows what consequences of war are on the lives of soldiers on either side of the border. 1971: Beyond Borders
